duties_responsibilities.duty: Interview patients for all pertinent account information and verify insurance coverage.
Understand and explain policies regarding services, pricing, insurance billing, and payment of accounts.
Verify all insurance and obtain pre-certification/authorization.
Process patient charts according to paperwork flow needs and established productivity standards.
Meet/exceed performance expectations and complete work within the required timeframe.

education_certification.credential: 1 year of related experience required. Demonstrates proficiency in Microsoft Office applications and others as required.
